```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
setwd("C:/Users/Sophy/Desktop/JJ Coursera/Data Products")


TasDevIcon <- makeIcon("./TasDevil.jpeg", iconWidth = 40, iconHeight = 40, iconAnchorX = 4, iconAnchorY = 4)


JJMap <- data.frame(lat = c(-42.8821, -37.8136), lng = c(147.3272, 144.9631))
JJMap %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(popup="JJ's Work Offices", icon = TasDevIcon)



```
